title: IntroCall
body:
<<freezeTime GUI true>>
<<stopPhoneRing IntroEventSystem>>
Chief Simmons: Good, you're still in your office.
->You know me. Always working.
    Chief Simmons: Uh huh.
->Yeah I fell asleep at my desk.
    Chief Simmons: Again? We've talked about this.
->Yeah, just finishing up that last case.
    Chief Simmons: Well that can wait for now.
Chief Simmons: There's been a death in the business district.
Chief Simmons: I need you to head down there and investigate. Work out whether it's suspicious or not.
->I'll head down now.
    Chief Simmons: Good. I'll send you the address. Head over there as soon as possible.
    <<set $murdersceneUnlocked to true>>
    <<UnlockPlayer IntroEventSystem>>
    <<freezeTime GUI false>>
    <<set $CanTravel to true>>
